title: How to use Nicotine Pouches?
description: Place a nicotine pouch between your gum and upper lip. Keep it there for about 45 minutes, then dispose it in the waste container.

title: What is the Difference Between Nicotine Pouches and Snus?
description: CLEW and Snus are two distinct products. Snus is a traditional oral tobacco product made from air-dried tobacco, while CLEW is a new-generation oral nicotine product that contains no tobacco.
